title: Magnetized cubic zinc MOFs for efficient removal of hazardous cationic and anionic dyes in aqueous solutions
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,19322-19330
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02453B, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ramy R. Abd El-Mouhsen, Gamal O. El-Sayed, Hesham H. El-Feky, Mostafa M. H. Khalil, Islam M. El-Sewify
The magnetized nanocubes with large surface area and uniform micropores allow for eliminating a large number of organic dyes from wastewater effectively, and their strong adsorption capability persisted even after four reuse cycles.
